techmeme.title: Samsung's new Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 are the first smartphones to ship loaded with Android 16, and the Watch 8 Series are the first to get Wear OS 6 (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
Google begins rolling out Gemini for Wear OS, replacing Assistant, "over the coming weeks" to Wear OS 4+ on the Pixel, Samsung, OnePlus, OPPO, Xiaomi, and more (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Samsung unveils the $899+ Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, with a smaller cover screen than the Z Flip7's, a smaller battery, no telephoto, and Android 16, in two colors (Andrew Romero/9to5Google)
Google adds new AI and gaming features to Android's Circle to Search, and Gemini Live support for foldables and third-party apps, starting with Samsung devices (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Samsung unveils the $1,100+ Galaxy Z Flip7, with a larger 4.1-inch external and 6.9-inch internal display, a 13.7mm body, a more durable folding hinge, and more (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
